title: sri shaNmukam
sahitya:
shreeshaNmukam sumukam bhaavayE

sruta janaarti panjanam niranjanam

(shree shaN)



anupallavi



eeshaNaartraya vivarjitaamala - ma

neeshamanO kEham guHam anvaham

(shree shaN)



caraNam



vaLLi dEvasEnaa hrutayitam

varadandimukaa varajam varadam

pullaaravinda daladrusam asadrusam

boodara duhitri sutam siva sitam

bhoomapala suradaaraka kaalam

buvijativija bhaharaNa suseelam

bujakaraaja sannibhairavi niba

bhraharaNOjvala bujaihi krutaleelam

(shree shaN)
